name: Samurai Trials
description:
Samurai Trails is local multiplayer game where players race up the level to be the first to the finish line. 

It is an innovative take on the classic family board game, taking fun from around the table to the digital age with turn-based gameplay and dice inspired mechanics. 

Features: 

  • Local Multiplayer 2-4 Players
  • Quick Fast-Paced 2D Platforming
  • Turn-Based Gameplay
  • Procedurally Generated Level

Controls: 

  • Xbox or Playstation Controller. Please see game menus for full controls list. 
  • One controller needed. Just pass it around once your turn is up!
